content: खंड् {c10c} <ab>P.</ab> (खंडयति, खंडित) {@--1@} To break, cut, tear, break to pieces, crush; <ls>Bk. 15. 54</ls>; सौहार्दं शकटेन खंडितं <ls>Mu. 5. 18</ls>; <ls>Śi. 7. 31</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">20. 24</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">6. 16</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">12. 3.</ls> {@--2@} To defeat completely, destroy, dispel; रजनीचरनाथेन खंडिते तिमिरे निशि <ls>H. 2. 111.</ls> {@--3@} To disappoint; frustrate, cross in love; स्त्रीभिः कस्य न खंडितं भुवि मनः <ls>Pt. 1. 146.</ls> {@--4@} To disturb. {@--5@} To cheat.
